body: It seems the annotation text for both the **Decompose EP Construction** and **Decompose EP Material** components are not right... Pls kindly verify! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dm99ly9wi67oYUWGdcZoPLo2iak4EpvhBGx8d-38rASmmqP0WET6u2nqDYXkd6dGP7dM-cslZrmqojitEstR4ozcFfUrXVF0/Picture1.png)
topic: [bug fixed] annotation text for Decompose EP Construction is not right

replies.body: Thanks Grasshope! It is fixed now.
